<!-- Smart Appointment Booking System Instructions -->

This project is a comprehensive appointment booking system with the following components:
- Frontend: React.js with TypeScript
- Backend: Node.js with Express.js  
- Database: PostgreSQL with Prisma ORM
- Authentication: JWT tokens
- Real-time: Socket.io
- Payments: Stripe integration
- Notifications: Email & SMS

## Development Guidelines
- Use modern React hooks and TypeScript
- Implement proper error handling and validation
- Follow REST API conventions
- Use environment variables for configuration
- Implement comprehensive testing
- Follow security best practices

## Core Features
1. User authentication and authorization
2. Service provider management
3. Real-time calendar booking
4. Payment processing
5. Notification system
6. Admin dashboard
7. Booking analytics
